title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Microlearning-Based Mathematics Teaching Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary-level mathematical concepts (appropriate for primary students)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain elementary math core concepts (fractions, decimals, basic operations) with 90% accuracy using 5-minute microlearning modules.
Learners engage in self-directed learning at least three times weekly via interactive quizzes in mobile environments.
Learners complete a math activity design project applicable to real classrooms within two weeks, based on microlearning content.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
